SELECT * FROM board_post WHERE idx = #{idx} AND delete_yn = 0

SELECT MIN(post_idx) FROM hierarchical_board WHERE post_idx = #{parentIdx}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_post (board_idx, board_group_idx, user_no, title, content, upload_date, notice_yn, secret_yn) VALUES (#{boardIdx}, #{boardGroupIdx}, #{userNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{uploadDate}, #{noticeYn}, #{secretYn})

INSERT INTO hierarchical_board ( post_idx, parent_idx, depth, sorts ) SELECT #{idx}, #{parentIdx}, #{depth}, COALESCE(MAX(sibling.sorts), 0) + 1 FROM hierarchical_board parent LEFT JOIN hierarchical_board sibling ON parent.post_idx = sibling.parent_idx WHERE parent.post_idx = #{parentIdx}
